game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Cave of Shadows
game.description: An ancient artifact has been rumored to be located in the Cave of Shadows. Your task is to enter the cave, retrieve the artifact and bring it back safely.

tasks.objective: Reach the entrance of the Cave of Shadows
tasks.description: Navigate through the forest to find the hidden entrance of the cave
Explore the cave. Overcome the obstacles and retrieve the ancient artifact.

tasks.objective: Return the artifact to Old Man Jenkins
tasks.description: After retrieving the artifact, make your way back to Old Man Jenkins and hand it over to him.
